Insurance company calls ME & asks me to confirm my identity. I say - but you called me! Confirm your identity! You could be anyone!
@DarrenJPrior @seanohargain 1 qualification: census may understate foreigners. Some dual nationality = Irish. New database to correct this
@seanohargain @DarrenJPrior I live in Meath & never drink coffee! Consult census of nationalities in primary schools. Gs 100% Irish (2014)

@seanohargain @CnaG @gaelscoileanna @gaelscoilosrai & look, I want to stress. Irish is grand. There's a wider principle of self-selecting..

This guy Frantzman is getting traction for claiming Obama "banned" Muslims from the 6 countries. In fact, they justâ€¦ https://t.co/jHD9ETrKDK
@scottisbell_ @wordpressdotcom Obama didn't ban muslims (or anyone else from those countries). They just halted the Visa Waiver Program.
@English_Woman @wordpressdotcom they weren't banned. The Visa Waiver Program for those countries was halted. HUGE difference.
@JohnPMaye @Independent_ie thanks!
FFS. With media like this, is it any wonder Trump got elected? And we think we're bad? https://t.co/0QjuZreOQa
Thanks to a compulsory Irish education I have no idea what this says but I still think identity politics is divisivâ€¦ https://t.co/urzt2fUrpy
@keelinodonoghue @mairenihuigin fair enough. I'll check into status of various proposed reforms.
@mairenihuigin @KevinHigginsIrl @eilishor Oh c'mon - what's John Crown's private income?
@GentleBirth @TalkingPointNT @BirthEvidence Yes - presentation WAY more important than size.
@GentleBirth @TalkingPointNT @DeirdreMunro will do!
@HomeBirthIRL It's so lucky I'd booked a home birth. Super fast labour. Would have given birth in car park if I'd had to leave house.
@KevinHigginsIrl reforming Health services massive project. One gets the feeling vested interests don't want change to T&C's.
@KevinHigginsIrl true. One thing tho': is fact that consultants can become millionaires via hybrid system any obstacle to reform?
@tinyRoRo ok that at least. We'll keep trying!
@tinyRoRo But language re inductions etc may have been technical. Perhaps as we're all well informed we didn't realise..
@tinyRoRo gosh - I thought each panellist stressed importance of mother's choice & partnership with caregiver. Krysia v passionate on that.
@KevinHigginsIrl we'll be fair - it's hard to change working conditions over night & consultants getting rises no one else is
What is a normal childbirth? #wearedelivering #IrishMatExp https://t.co/B6lw5ccnfE
@sylviamurphyt I knew a woman with concealed pregnancy. So complicated..
@dublindoula also, long term abdominal pain due to scar tissue and wounds. But women don't realise until decade later...
@dublindoula very much. Sad inquest in UK last week where placenta not removed properly & mother died after section :-(
thanks Neasa! I'm over Informed on maternity issues ;-) I'd talk all day about it. @nessomalley @NewstalkFM
@dublindoula Women told risk too high, but original paper said risk quite small. Read ESRI paper by Michael Turner and Richard Layte 4 more
@dublindoula 1/2 I was told 1 academic paper in US ref small risk of old section wound breaching: changed Ob practice in Irl overnight.
For those interested in Vb-ac etc.. https://t.co/V7hgt7eEe0
@tinyRoRo why? what did we do? :-)
@dublindoula @ghook roight ;-)
@dublindoula I meant to say - we shld have asked her to watch the show. Hope she wasn't bored waiting.. :-/
@sylviamurphyt do! even more important that rural women not in car in labour. Medics should be in the car going TO the woman...
@sylviamurphyt definitely. I had home birth with community midwives holles st. Brilliant opportunity.
@mgtmurphy123 @DeirdreMunro @NewstalkFM @meogan @AIMSIreland @dublindoula sure! And we never got round to home birth..
@sylviamurphyt oh that'd be great. We've so much else to talk about! keep in touch. Sarah
@sylviamurphyt We recorded today but I'll retweet now. Will you remind me pls to promote on show next week? Tweet Sat am! I had HmBirth :-)
